User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (X11; Linux x86_64; rv:10.0a1) Gecko/20111028 Firefox/10.0a1
Build ID: 20111028031044

Steps to reproduce:

Open enough tabs to allow the tab bar to scroll left and right.
Open a tab to the far right of the tab bar (so now there is space to scroll left).
Right click and click Pin as app tab.


Actual results:

The tab becomes pinned.
The tab bar scrolls all the way to the left.


Expected results:

The tab becomes pinned.
The tab bar stays where it was (scrolled all the way to the right).
comments.author: test_test_testing@yahoo.co.uk
